item.title: Setup Python programming environment on MacOS
item.description: I. Introduction Working with python is a happy thing, but as a newbie, the first barrier in front of me is how to set up a programming environment of python. This tutorial is derived from my experience and let’s go through this to step on the journey of python quickly. Usually, my working version of Python is 3.6.5, so this article get it as an example, but the general principles apply to any other 3+ version of python.
